# Flite

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="320"
  height="568"
  type="flite"
  data-guid="aa7bf589-6d51-4194-91f4-d22eef8e3688"
  data-mixins=""
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration and implementation details, please [contact Flite Support](http://www.flite.com/).

Supported parameters:

-   `data-guid`
-   `data-mixins`
